lexUnit.definition: COD: a set or category of things having some property in common and differentiated from others by kind or quality

sentence.text: WISARD consists of three layers , and is capable of three operations : learning to recognise a class of images , recognising whether a new example is in a learned class , and distinguishing between classes .
The input for such a reflex could come from a single class of broadly tuned vertical orientation detectors .
